Package core

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
core.Camera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
The class that handles the camera of the game engine

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    float getAspectRatio()
    Getter, returns the aspect ratio of the camera
    float getFOV()
    Getter, returns the field of view of the camera
    static Camera getInstance()
    Getter, this function returns the instance of the current camera, if one does not exist it creates and then returns it
    Vector3f getPosition()
    Getter, returns the position vector of the camera
    Vector3f getRotation()
    Getter, returns the rotation vector of the camera
    float getzFar()
    Getter, returns zFar - maximum view distance
    float getzNear()
    Getter, returns zNear - minimum view distance
    void init​(float aspectRatio)
    This function initializes the camera to the default settings: position - 0 0 0 rotation - 0 0 0 zFar - 100 zNear - 1 Field of View - 60
    void init​(Vector3f position, Vector3f rotation, float FOV, float zFar, float zNear, float aspectRatio)
    Initializes the camera to the given custom settings
    Camera movePosition​(float x, float y, float z)
    This function moves the camera by the given margins in its direction, returns the current instance of the camera
    Camera moveRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
    This function rotates the camera by the given margins, returns the current instance of the camera
    Camera setFOV​(float FOV)
    Setter, sets the field of view of the camera, returns the instance of the camera
    Camera setPosition​(float x, float y, float z)
    Setter, sets the position of the camera, returns the current instance of the camera
    Camera setRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
    Setter, sets the rotation of the camera, returns the current instance of the camera
    Camera setzFar​(float zFar)
    Setter, sets the zFar parameter of the camera, returns the instance of the camera
    Camera setzNear​(float zNear)
    Setter, sets the zNear parameter of the camera, returns the instance of the camera

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Camera getInstance()
      Getter, this function returns the instance of the current camera, if one does not exist it creates and then returns it
      Returns:
      the instance of the current camera

    • init

      public void init​(float aspectRatio)
      This function initializes the camera to the default settings: position - 0 0 0 rotation - 0 0 0 zFar - 100 zNear - 1 Field of View - 60
      Parameters:
      aspectRatio - the aspect ratio of the camera element

    • init

      public void init​(Vector3f position, Vector3f rotation, float FOV, float zFar, float zNear, float aspectRatio)
      Initializes the camera to the given custom settings
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the camera in the 3D space
      rotation - the rotation of the camera
      FOV - the field of view
      zFar - - how close should an item be to not be seen
      zNear - - how far should an item be to not be seen
      aspectRatio - the aspect ratio

    • getFOV

      public float getFOV()
      Getter, returns the field of view of the camera
      Returns:
      the field of view of the camera

    • setFOV

      public Camera setFOV​(float FOV)
      Setter, sets the field of view of the camera, returns the instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      FOV - the desired field of view
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • getzFar

      public float getzFar()
      Getter, returns zFar - maximum view distance
      Returns:
      returns zFar

    • setzFar

      public Camera setzFar​(float zFar)
      Setter, sets the zFar parameter of the camera, returns the instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      zFar - the desired maximum view distance of the camera
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • getzNear

      public float getzNear()
      Getter, returns zNear - minimum view distance
      Returns:
      the zNear

    • setzNear

      public Camera setzNear​(float zNear)
      Setter, sets the zNear parameter of the camera, returns the instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      zNear - the desired minimum view distance of the camera
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • getAspectRatio

      public float getAspectRatio()
      Getter, returns the aspect ratio of the camera
      Returns:
      the aspect ratio of the camera

    • getPosition

      public Vector3f getPosition()
      Getter, returns the position vector of the camera
      Returns:
      returns a 3 float element position vector of the camera, format: X, Y, Z

    • getRotation

      public Vector3f getRotation()
      Getter, returns the rotation vector of the camera
      Returns:
      returns a 3 float element rotation vector of the camera

    • setPosition

      public Camera setPosition​(float x, float y, float z)
      Setter, sets the position of the camera, returns the current instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      x - the desired x coordinate of the camera
      y - the desired y coordinate of the camera
      z - the desired z coordinate of the camera
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • setRotation

      public Camera setRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
      Setter, sets the rotation of the camera, returns the current instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      x - the desired x coordinate of the camera
      y - the desired y coordinate of the camera
      z - the desired z coordinate of the camera
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • moveRotation

      public Camera moveRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
      This function rotates the camera by the given margins, returns the current instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      x - the amount to move the x coordinate by
      y - the amount to move the y coordinate by
      z - the amount to move the z coordinate by
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera

    • movePosition

      public Camera movePosition​(float x, float y, float z)
      This function moves the camera by the given margins in its direction, returns the current instance of the camera
      Parameters:
      x - the amount to move the x coordinate by
      y - the amount to move the y coordinate by
      z - the amount to move the z coordinate by
      Returns:
      the current instance of the camera
